title: Brian Makse - Racer, writer, instructor
description:
Brian Makse is a championship-winning racing driver, auto writer and on-camera presenter with a large YouTube following. His experience racing gives him a perspective about cars that few journalists have. 

 

This show is also available as a video, full of pictures, videos, and other assets pertaining to the conversation: https://youtu.be/HsJ_2EWgdXM

 

Check out Brian's work!

https://www.youtube.com/user/brianmakse/videos

https://twitter.com/brianmakse?lang=en

https://www.instagram.com/brianmakse/?hl=en

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
